Title: Chapter 1
Writer: Noah Hawley, Noah Hawley (created by), Chris Claremont (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Sienkiewicz (based on the Marvel comics by)
Actors: Dan Stevens, Rachel Keller, Aubrey Plaza, Bill Irwin
Plot: A troubled young man battling mental illness wonders if the visions he experiences are real following a strange encounter with a fellow patient.
